verification.payload:
tree 75db85323f820470b6f41a34c388ab7408b68402
parent 4c0c89307dabbf51a32551471c54966ddf7c5bc3
author Jon Atack <jon@atack.com> 1591544005 +0200
committer Jon Atack <jon@atack.com> 1591545595 +0200

doc: release note for `db` log category removal

files.patch:
@@ -94,6 +94,9 @@ Build System
 Updated settings
 ----------------
 
+- The `-debug=db` logging category, which was deprecated in 0.20 and replaced by
+  `-debug=walletdb` to distinguish it from `coindb`, has been removed. (#19202)
+
 Changes to Wallet or GUI related settings can be found in the GUI or Wallet  section below.
 
 New settings
